    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf中ConfigurationObserver的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf中ConfigurationObserver的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  PropagatingConfigurationObserver
      This extension to ConfigurationObserver allows the configuration to propagate to the children of the current ConfigurationObserver.
      类型参数类型为ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Set<ConfigurationObserver> ConfigurationManager.configurationObservers 
      参数类型为ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ConfigurationManager.deregisterObserver(ConfigurationObserver observer)
      Deregister an observer class
      void ConfigurationManager.registerObserver(ConfigurationObserver observer)
      Register an observer class

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc中ConfigurationObserver的使用

      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  NettyRpcServer
      An RPC server with Netty4 implementation.
      class  RpcServer
      An RPC server that hosts protobuf described Services.
      class  SimpleRpcScheduler
      The default scheduler.
      class  SimpleRpcServer
      The RPC server with native java NIO implementation deriving from Hadoop to host protobuf described Services.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master中ConfigurationObserver的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master中ConfigurationObserver的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  LoadBalancer
      Makes decisions about the placement and movement of Regions across RegionServers.
      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HMaster
      HMaster is the "master server" for HBase.
      static class  HMasterCommandLine.LocalHMaster 
      class  MasterRpcServices
      Implements the master RPC services.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer中ConfigurationObserver的使用

      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BaseLoadBalancer
      The base class for load balancers.
      class  FavoredStochasticBalancer
      An implementation of the LoadBalancer that assigns favored nodes for each region.
      class  SimpleLoadBalancer
      Makes decisions about the placement and movement of Regions across RegionServers.
      class  StochasticLoadBalancer
      This is a best effort load balancer.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.cleaner中ConfigurationObserver的使用

      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.cleaner中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CleanerChore<T extends FileCleanerDelegate>
      Abstract Cleaner that uses a chain of delegates to clean a directory of files
      class  HFileCleaner
      This Chore, every time it runs, will clear the HFiles in the hfile archive folder that are deletable for each HFile cleaner in the chain.
      class  LogCleaner
      This Chore, every time it runs, will attempt to delete the WALs and Procedure WALs in the old logs folder.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中ConfigurationObserver的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中ConfigurationObserver的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  Region
      Region is a subset of HRegion with operations required for the Coprocessors.
      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CompactSplit
      Compact region on request and then run split if appropriate
      class  HMobStore
      The store implementation to save MOBs (medium objects), it extends the HStore.
      class  HRegion
      Regions store data for a certain region of a table.
      class  HRegionServer
      HRegionServer makes a set of HRegions available to clients.
      class  HStore
      A Store holds a column family in a Region.
      class  RSRpcServices
      Implements the regionserver RPC services.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup中ConfigurationObserver的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup中ConfigurationObserver的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  RSGroupableBalancer
      Marker Interface.
      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  RSGroupBasedLoadBalancer
      GroupBasedLoadBalancer, used when Region Server Grouping is configured (HBase-6721) It does region balance based on a table's group membership.
